regulatory_status.nist_rev2_status: Withdrawn but required via DoD class deviation
regulatory_status.nist_rev3_status: Current NIST version, not yet required for CMMC

controls.title: Authorized Access Control
controls.requirement: Limit system access to authorized users, processes acting on behalf of authorized users, and devices (including other systems)

controls.title: Transaction & Function Control
controls.requirement: Limit system access to the types of transactions and functions that authorized users are permitted to execute

controls.title: CUI Flow Enforcement
controls.requirement: Control the flow of CUI in accordance with approved authorizations

controls.title: Separation of Duties
controls.requirement: Separate the duties of individuals to reduce the risk of malevolent activity without collusion

controls.title: Least Privilege
controls.requirement: Employ the principle of least privilege, including for specific security functions and privileged accounts

controls.title: Non-Privileged Account Use
controls.requirement: Use non-privileged accounts or roles when accessing nonsecurity functions

controls.title: Privileged Functions
controls.requirement: Prevent non-privileged users from executing privileged functions and capture the execution of such functions in audit logs

controls.title: Unsuccessful Logon Attempts
controls.requirement: Limit unsuccessful logon attempts

controls.title: Privacy & Security Notices
controls.requirement: Provide privacy and security notices consistent with applicable CUI rules

controls.title: Session Lock
controls.requirement: Use session lock with pattern-hiding displays to prevent access and viewing of data after a period of inactivity

controls.title: Session Termination
controls.requirement: Terminate (automatically) a user session after a defined condition

controls.title: Remote Access Control
controls.requirement: Monitor and control remote access sessions

controls.title: Remote Access Encryption
controls.requirement: Employ cryptographic mechanisms to protect the confidentiality of remote access sessions

controls.title: Remote Access Routing
controls.requirement: Route remote access via managed access control points

controls.title: Privileged Remote Access
controls.requirement: Authorize remote execution of privileged commands and remote access to security-relevant information

controls.title: Wireless Access Authorization
controls.requirement: Authorize wireless access prior to allowing such connections

controls.title: Wireless Access Protection
controls.requirement: Protect wireless access using authentication and encryption

controls.title: Mobile Device Connection
controls.requirement: Control connection of mobile devices

controls.title: Mobile Device Encryption
controls.requirement: Encrypt CUI on mobile devices and mobile computing platforms

controls.title: External System Connections
controls.requirement: Verify and control/limit connections to and use of external systems

controls.title: Portable Storage Use
controls.requirement: Limit use of portable storage devices on external systems

controls.title: Publicly Accessible Content
controls.requirement: Control information posted or processed on publicly accessible systems

controls.title: Security Awareness
controls.requirement: Ensure that managers, systems administrators, and users of organizational systems are made aware of the security risks associated with their activities and of the applicable policies, standards, and procedures related to the security of those systems

controls.title: Role-Based Training
controls.requirement: Ensure that personnel are trained to carry out their assigned information security-related duties and responsibilities
evidence_types: Specialized training records for IT/security staff

controls.title: Insider Threat Awareness
controls.requirement: Provide security awareness training on recognizing and reporting potential indicators of insider threat

controls.title: System Auditing
controls.requirement: Create and retain system audit logs and records to the extent needed to enable the monitoring, analysis, investigation, and reporting of unlawful or unauthorized system activity

controls.title: User Accountability
controls.requirement: Ensure that the actions of individual system users can be uniquely traced to those users, so they can be held accountable for their actions
evidence_types: Audit log samples showing user attribution

controls.title: Event Review
controls.requirement: Review and update logged events

controls.title: Audit Failure Alerting
controls.requirement: Alert in the event of an audit logging process failure

controls.title: Audit Correlation
controls.requirement: Correlate audit record review, analysis, and reporting processes for investigation and response to indications of unlawful, unauthorized, suspicious, or unusual activity

controls.title: Audit Reduction & Reporting
controls.requirement: Provide audit record reduction and report generation to support on-demand analysis and reporting

controls.title: Authoritative Time Source
controls.requirement: Provide a system capability that compares and synchronizes internal system clocks with an authoritative source to generate time stamps for audit records

controls.title: Audit Protection
controls.requirement: Protect audit information and audit logging tools from unauthorized access, modification, and deletion

controls.title: Audit Management
controls.requirement: Limit management of audit logging functionality to a subset of privileged users
evidence_types: Access control lists for logging systems
Privileged user list for audit management

controls.title: System Baselining
controls.requirement: Establish and maintain baseline configurations and inventories of organizational systems (including hardware, software, firmware, and documentation) throughout the respective system development life cycles

controls.title: Security Configuration Enforcement
controls.requirement: Establish and enforce security configuration settings for information technology products employed in organizational systems

controls.title: System Change Management
controls.requirement: Track, review, approve or disapprove, and log changes to organizational systems

controls.title: Security Impact Analysis
controls.requirement: Analyze the security impact of changes prior to implementation

controls.title: Access Restrictions for Change
controls.requirement: Define, document, approve, and enforce physical and logical access restrictions associated with changes to organizational systems

controls.title: Least Functionality
controls.requirement: Employ the principle of least functionality by configuring organizational systems to provide only essential capabilities

controls.title: Nonessential Functionality
controls.requirement: Restrict, disable, or prevent the use of nonessential programs, functions, ports, protocols, and services

controls.title: Application Execution Policy
controls.requirement: Apply deny-by-exception (blacklisting) policy to prevent the use of unauthorized software or deny-all, permit-by-exception (whitelisting) policy to allow the execution of authorized software

controls.title: User-Installed Software
controls.requirement: Control and monitor user-installed software

controls.title: Identification
controls.requirement: Identify system users, processes acting on behalf of users, and devices

controls.title: Authentication
controls.requirement: Authenticate (or verify) the identities of users, processes, or devices, as a prerequisite to allowing access to organizational systems

controls.title: Multifactor Authentication
controls.requirement: Use multifactor authentication for local and network access to privileged accounts and for network access to non-privileged accounts

controls.title: Replay-Resistant Authentication
controls.requirement: Employ replay-resistant authentication mechanisms for network access to privileged and non-privileged accounts

controls.title: Identifier Reuse
controls.requirement: Prevent reuse of identifiers for a defined period

controls.title: Identifier Handling
controls.requirement: Disable identifiers after a defined period of inactivity

controls.title: Password Complexity
controls.requirement: Enforce a minimum password complexity and change of characters when new passwords are created

controls.title: Password Reuse
controls.requirement: Prohibit password reuse for a specified number of generations

controls.title: Temporary Passwords
controls.requirement: Allow temporary password use for system logons with an immediate change to a permanent password
evidence_types: User must change password at next logon settings

controls.title: Cryptographically-Protected Passwords
controls.requirement: Store and transmit only cryptographically-protected passwords

controls.title: Obscure Feedback
controls.requirement: Obscure feedback of authentication information

controls.title: Incident Handling
controls.requirement: Establish an operational incident-handling capability for organizational systems that includes preparation, detection, analysis, containment, recovery, and user response activities

controls.title: Incident Reporting
controls.requirement: Track, document, and report incidents to designated officials and/or authorities both internal and external to the organization

controls.title: Incident Response Testing
controls.requirement: Test the organizational incident response capability

controls.title: System Maintenance
controls.requirement: Perform maintenance on organizational systems

controls.title: Maintenance Control
controls.requirement: Provide controls on the tools, techniques, mechanisms, and personnel used to conduct system maintenance

controls.title: Equipment Sanitization
controls.requirement: Ensure equipment removed for off-site maintenance is sanitized of any CUI

controls.title: Media Inspection
controls.requirement: Check media containing diagnostic and test programs for malicious code before the media are used in organizational systems

controls.title: Nonlocal Maintenance
controls.requirement: Require multifactor authentication to establish nonlocal maintenance sessions via external network connections and terminate such connections when nonlocal maintenance is complete

controls.title: Maintenance Personnel
controls.requirement: Supervise the maintenance activities of maintenance personnel without required access authorization

controls.title: Media Protection
controls.requirement: Protect (i.e., physically control and securely store) system media containing CUI, both paper and digital
evidence_types: Physical security controls for media storage

controls.title: Media Access
controls.requirement: Limit access to CUI on system media to authorized users
evidence_types: Access logs for media storage areas

controls.title: Media Sanitization
controls.requirement: Sanitize or destroy system media containing CUI before disposal or release for reuse

controls.title: Media Marking
controls.requirement: Mark media with necessary CUI markings and distribution limitations

controls.title: Media Transport Accountability
controls.requirement: Control access to media containing CUI and maintain accountability for media during transport outside of controlled areas

controls.title: Portable Storage Encryption
controls.requirement: Implement cryptographic mechanisms to protect the confidentiality of CUI stored on digital media during transport unless otherwise protected by alternative physical safeguards

controls.title: Removable Media
controls.requirement: Control the use of removable media on system components

controls.title: Shared Media
controls.requirement: Prohibit the use of portable storage devices when such devices have no identifiable owner

controls.title: CUI Backup Protection
controls.requirement: Protect the confidentiality of backup CUI at storage locations

controls.title: Screen Individuals
controls.requirement: Screen individuals prior to authorizing access to organizational systems containing CUI

controls.title: Personnel Actions
controls.requirement: Ensure that organizational systems containing CUI are protected during and after personnel actions such as terminations and transfers

controls.title: Limit Physical Access
controls.requirement: Limit physical access to organizational systems, equipment, and the respective operating environments to authorized individuals

controls.title: Monitor Physical Facility
controls.requirement: Protect and monitor the physical facility and support infrastructure for organizational systems

controls.title: Visitor Management
controls.requirement: Escort visitors and monitor visitor activity

controls.title: Physical Access Logs
controls.requirement: Maintain audit logs of physical access

controls.title: Physical Access Devices
controls.requirement: Control and manage physical access devices

controls.title: Alternate Work Sites
controls.requirement: Enforce safeguarding measures for CUI at alternate work sites

controls.title: Risk Assessments
controls.requirement: Periodically assess the risk to organizational operations (including mission, functions, image, or reputation), organizational assets, and individuals, resulting from the operation of organizational systems and the associated processing, storage, or transmission of CUI

controls.title: Vulnerability Scanning
controls.requirement: Scan for vulnerabilities in organizational systems and applications periodically and when new vulnerabilities affecting those systems and applications are identified

controls.title: Vulnerability Remediation
controls.requirement: Remediate vulnerabilities in accordance with risk assessments

controls.title: Security Assessment
controls.requirement: Periodically assess the security controls in organizational systems to determine if the controls are effective in their application

controls.title: Plan of Action
controls.requirement: Develop and implement plans of action designed to correct deficiencies and reduce or eliminate vulnerabilities in organizational systems

controls.title: Continuous Monitoring
controls.requirement: Monitor security controls on an ongoing basis to ensure the continued effectiveness of the controls

controls.title: System Security Plan
controls.requirement: Develop, document, and periodically update system security plans that describe system boundaries, system environments of operation, how security requirements are implemented, and the relationships with or connections to other systems

controls.title: Boundary Protection
controls.requirement: Monitor, control, and protect communications (i.e., information transmitted or received by organizational systems) at the external boundaries and key internal boundaries of organizational systems

controls.title: Security Engineering
controls.requirement: Employ architectural designs, software development techniques, and systems engineering principles that promote effective information security within organizational systems

controls.title: Role Separation
controls.requirement: Separate user functionality from system management functionality

controls.title: Shared Resource Control
controls.requirement: Prevent unauthorized and unintended information transfer via shared system resources

controls.title: Network Segmentation
controls.requirement: Implement subnetworks for publicly accessible system components that are physically or logically separated from internal networks

controls.title: Network Communications Deny by Default
controls.requirement: Deny network communications traffic by default and allow network communications traffic by exception (i.e., deny all, permit by exception)

controls.title: Split Tunneling
controls.requirement: Prevent remote devices from simultaneously establishing non-remote connections with organizational systems and communicating via some other connection to resources in external networks (i.e., split tunneling)

controls.title: Data in Transit
controls.requirement: Implement cryptographic mechanisms to prevent unauthorized disclosure of CUI during transmission unless otherwise protected by alternative physical safeguards

controls.title: Session Termination
controls.requirement: Terminate network connections associated with communications sessions at the end of the sessions or after a defined period of inactivity

controls.title: Key Management
controls.requirement: Establish and manage cryptographic keys for cryptography employed in organizational systems

controls.title: CUI Encryption
controls.requirement: Employ FIPS-validated cryptography when used to protect the confidentiality of CUI

controls.title: Collaborative Computing
controls.requirement: Prohibit remote activation of collaborative computing devices and provide indication of devices in use to users present at the device

controls.title: Mobile Code
controls.requirement: Control and monitor the use of mobile code

controls.title: VoIP Security
controls.requirement: Control and monitor the use of Voice over Internet Protocol (VoIP) technologies

controls.title: Communications Authenticity
controls.requirement: Protect the authenticity of communications sessions

controls.title: Data at Rest
controls.requirement: Protect the confidentiality of CUI at rest

controls.title: Flaw Remediation
controls.requirement: Identify, report, and correct system flaws in a timely manner

controls.title: Malicious Code Protection
controls.requirement: Provide protection from malicious code at designated locations within organizational systems

controls.title: Security Alerts & Advisories
controls.requirement: Monitor system security alerts and advisories and take action in response

controls.title: Update Malicious Code Protection
controls.requirement: Update malicious code protection mechanisms when new releases are available

controls.title: System & File Scanning
controls.requirement: Perform periodic scans of organizational systems and real-time scans of files from external sources as files are downloaded, opened, or executed

controls.title: System Monitoring
controls.requirement: Monitor organizational systems, including inbound and outbound communications traffic, to detect attacks and indicators of potential attacks

controls.title: Unauthorized Use Detection
controls.requirement: Identify unauthorized use of organizational systems

poam_eligibility.exception: SC.L2-3.13.11 (CUI Encryption) may be on POA&M if encryption is employed but not FIPS-validated

required_sections.description: System name, description, and unique identifiers
CUI categories and data sensitivity classification
Contact information for system owner and security personnel
Clear definition of system scope and boundaries
Network diagrams showing CUI flow and boundaries
Connections to other systems, external services, and third parties
110 controls with implementation status and descriptions
Security roles including Information Owner, System Owner, and SSO
CUI Assets, Security Protection Assets, Contractor Risk Managed Assets, Specialized Assets

timeline_requirements.closeout_period: 180 days from Conditional CMMC Status Date
timeline_requirements.closeout_assessment: Must be performed by authorized C3PAO

c3pao_assessment.definition: Certified Third-Party Assessor Organization authorized by Cyber AB

requirements.personnel: Certified CMMC Professionals (CCPs) and Certified Assessors (CCAs)

assessment_process: SSP review for completeness and accuracy
c3pao_assessment.independence_requirement: C3PAOs cannot provide consulting services - they identify issues but cannot advise on remediation
